results.name: Primes p such that p^2 divides 14^(p-1) - 1.
link: Amir Akbary and Sahar Siavashi, The Largest Known Wieferich Numbers, INTEGERS, 18(2018), A3. See Table 1 p. 5.
Petr Ležák, Solutions of equation a^(p-1) mod p^2 = 1, p is prime
P. L. Montgomery, New solutions of a^p-1 == 1 (mod p^2), Math. Comp., 61 (203), 361-363
results.author: _Felix Fröhlich_, Apr 19 2014
